product_name: Metolius Climber's Hand Repair Balm - 0.5 oz.
long_description: Metolius Climber's Hand Repair balm is specially formulated for climbers' dry, chapped hands and fingers. Antiseptic blend speeds healing and promotes new skin growth. Can be applied directly to cuts, scrapes, sun burns, bug bites and chapped lips. Made in Oregon of natural, organic ingredients.
short_description: Metolius Climber's Hand Repair balm is specially formulated for climbers' dry, chapped hands and fingers.
